topics.body:
Another Markiplier thing:

I really like videos where he's with Bob or Wade. Not just when he's playing online with them (though those ones are almost always really good as well), but when they're actually physically there playing a game with him. He has a very good group dynamic that you don't really get to see in a lot of his other videos.
